amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 2, 4, 5, 8, 26, 33, 34, 36, 37, 40, 42, 46, 47, 48, 49, 50, 52, 56, 57, 59, 60, 61, 64, 65, 69, 74, 75, 76, 77, 81, and 96.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 336 - 90 (Roll no. 368).
